summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3223 for the improvement of Dexter Avenue, from Harrison Street to a connection with the existing pavement at the intersection of 4th Avenue North and Nickerson Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 39906, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
